move_forward.description: Move the vehicle forward using either distance in meters or time in seconds.

parameters.distance_m: Distance in meters (optional if time_s is provided).
parameters.time_s: Duration in seconds (optional if distance_m is provided).

move_backward.description: Move the vehicle backward by using negative MAVLink velocity.

turn_left.description: Rotate left around yaw axis by a specified angle.

parameters.turn_speed_deg: Yaw rotation speed in degrees per second.

turn_right.description: Rotate right around yaw axis by a specified angle.

parameters.turn_speed_deg: Yaw rotation speed in degrees per second.

stop.description: Stop all motion WITHOUT disarming motors.
